info.title: Front-end Developer & Project Management
info.description: Completed two internships at a proud Mexican company. During the first internship, participated in the refactoring of the 'CAJA' system, used by municipalities in Mexico for various processes. Activities included training with the Angular Framework and the 'CAJA' system, maintaining constant communication with the team, and contributing ideas and suggestions. Redesigned system views to improve responsiveness, UI/UX, and aesthetics, and refactored supporting modules. In the second internship, managed administrative tasks such as organizing documentation, creating test templates and artifacts, and facilitating developer meetings to track progress.
